### Dr. Lennart Wittkuhn

Lennart is a **Postdoctoral Researcher** in the [Research Group "Cognitive Neuroscience of Learning and Change"](https://www.psy.uni-hamburg.de/en/arbeitsbereiche/lern-und-veraenderungsmechanismen.html) at the [University of Hamburg](https://www.uni-hamburg.de/en.html).
In his scientific work, Lennart investigates **neural replay of task representations** in the human brain using functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI).
He is also passionate about **open science**, **research data management**, **reproducibility** and tools that improve the scientific workflow.

Find out more about Lennart and his work at [{{< var project.homepage >}}]({{< var project.homepage >}}).
